text: And Ju said to Badecar his chief officer, Cast him into the portion of ground of Nabuthai the Jezraelite, for I and thou remember, riding as we were 9. 25 Gr. on yokes, or chariots with pairs of horses.on chariots after Achaab his father, 9. 25 Gr. and the Lord.that the Lord took up this burden against him, saying,
